did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Gay male pornographic 8mm films; packages depict and characterize the sale of such material.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Gay male pornographic 8mm films; packages depict and characterize the sale of such material.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Archival copies not to be played.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Mold present inside video tapes in Box 9. May also be present in Boxes 4-8. Individuals with weak immune systems may need to take extra precautions.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Gay male pornographic movies, #7637. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
